name: One Piu Day
description: Play as a baby bird which has been rejected from its nest and will do its best to get back home. More than a classic 2D platformer, it's a story full of emotion with a unique artistic direction that is awaiting you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Window 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 1 MB RAM Graphics: Inted HD 5500 Storage: 500 MB available space
